newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Select Software cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Select Software cut.

text.p: Hambrecht & Quist cut its rating on shares of Select Software Inc to hold and cut its earnings estimates for the company after it announced a second quarter earnings shortfall late Wednesday.

-- reduced 1997 earnings estimate to $0.15 a share from $0.44 a share and revenue estimate to $28.8 million from $34.7 million. Reduced 1998 earnings estimate to $0.65 a share from $0.81 and revenue to $55 million from $62 million.
-- cited "significant management and transition issues" that could persist during a company transition.
-- The stock was down 1-3/4 to 6-1/8 in late morning trade.
